*** ** *** **** ******* He makes you feel very comfortable and gives you the best diagnosis.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My mom in law, Mrs Sabita Bose, Aged 72 Years, lives in kolkata and had severe pain in the low back both knees and both ankles. Also there was constant burning sensation. We met and consulted Dr Prakash BL in Vanditha Clinic on 15Jan2021 . He patiently heard the patient story, then diagnosed her to be OSTEOARTHRITIS GRADE 4. This was confirmed by the XRAYS and Bone Mineral Density Scan. I must compliment Dr Prakash's accurate diagnosis and disease prognosis too, the explanation was Lucid and very effective in our decision making. He started medication and advised TOTAL KNEE REPLACEMENT. The surgery was performed on 29Jan2021 in PROMED Hospital, Banashankari Stage II.

Doctor Prakash BL has scientifically & systematically explained the post surgery recovery procedure to the patient. The patient's co-operation is total.  He saw the patient two times every day, kept the patient cheerful and in good humour. He is accessible always and us just a call away, we found he responds immediately. 

Further his Communication is very good & effective. The pain management was awesome and very effective and so was the physiotherapy. Because she is Bengali, his recommended Physiotherapist - Dr Anirban Kundu also  was a WoW.  

Doctor never insisted or restricted with regard to food intake, but allowed to understand & evaluate on a day to day basis, which is helpful. Our next review with Dr Prakash BL is on 19Feb2021(Discharged on 04Feb2021).

Dr Prakash BL recommended, PROMED HOSPITAL. We were there from 28Jan2021 till 04Feb2021 in room#201.  I have no hesitation in recommending the same to everyone. Awesome experience, super services, great nurses and support staff, excellent doctors.and a healthy canteen serving nice food to the patients as well as the attendants. My compliments to my front office contact Mr Praveen too. Great job done by each one.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The experience could have been better. The doctor didn’t explain about the problem in depth. We had to dig in to get more details.

tags: None
review: I am not happy with Dr. Prakash ********** Consulated for knee pain. On the first visit, i was given pain killer spary and diclofenac sodium tabs. This didn’t lowered my pain and After 10 days i went for second consultation. This time Doctor directly suggested to go for a injection costing around 20k. I got bit tensed and visted a different orthopedist and understood that injection was not required. Aftet a month of proper rest, the pain got completely curied. Am completely fit and fine without having to take injection which would had given additional problems if application had went wrong.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Two months back,  I went with my mother* ******* ********** *********  he recommend a 3T MRI scanning. The scanning cost 11k.  More than the money,  my mother undergone a stress in the scanning.  After the scan,  he immediately recommend for a surgery.  We came of from him and took a second opinion from the different doctor.  My mother is doing well with out surgery now.  I am concerned that these treatments are more expensive *** ** ** ** * ******* **********  * ***** *** ******* ** ***** *** ***** *** *** ** ****** ** *** **** *****
reply_text: Dear Madam, I reviewed her case details, She has cuff issues in shoulder with sever pain and stiffnes. What she is having now is a temprovary relief and she requres an A'scopic procedure in near future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I went for my wife's knee pain. He doesnt spend much time to understand the problem he hardly spent twon mins and suggested for an MRI and for he suggests a particular LAB.
We were charged Rs. 500 for two mins and We got the MRI done.
Next day we went with the report and again We were charged Rs. 500.  This time he came up with a medical term say, "Problem A" and suggested medication for 3 months. 45 days gets over **** ** *********** and We decide to visit him again. Now he comes with some new medical term say, "Problem B", and again suggests new medication for next 3 months. And were charged Rs. 500.
 Again 15 days over **** ** ************ We have discontinued them medicine and started meeting a new doctor where We can see the improvement. 
It was a loss of preciuos time and money. A doctor should spend time and understand patients problem. I am not going to recommend him to anyone. Not good experience.
reply_text: Suggested supplements for long term, instead of pain medications which carry  risks and side effects. yes, you did see the improvement after 3 months that's because of the treatment initiated in first instance.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: As someone who loves boxing, sometimes I overdo it & damage my hands.I had a swollen nerve-Digital nerve neuroma.The doctor patiently listened to all my previous treatment, what meds I was on, etc.This gentleman(doc) gave the right meds & injection for the same. In fact I asked if my condition could be corrected with surgery, but the doc told me it'll be fine with frequent injections & meds.No offence to the doc federation, but some doctors I've visited have recommended a lot of scans even before hearing me out completely.Firstly, he knows his job, his treatment will help you.Secondly, there is a lot of mental tension with people who are into sports. You hurt or damage the tiniest nerve/tendon/ligament/cartilage of your body, you kind of get depressed that you'll never bounce back. The way doc explains the trauma and how it'll be fixed over time... boosts your morale.Lastly, the reception staff also were involved and helpful, unlike many who keep scrolling their phones.Finding the right doc for your condition will definitely benefit you.****** ******* *****

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Good Doctor And understanding about patients pain and helpful to the patient for recovering the leg

tags: None
review:
When I went there I had a very bad experience.I explained that I am suffering Chronic pain on my Spinal cord L4. I have been diagonised by Doctors of Jayanagar Nursing Home for the last 4 years. Dr BL Prakash didn't touch on my spinal where the pain is, instead he asked me to get an  X ray, which I have shown.Now he asked me to get a scan copy which will cost Rs 4000/- I reluctantl to do it and fade up. Unnecessary I wasted Rs 1425/- without any consultation and 2 hours time.I would seriously never recommend Dr Prakash for any consultation or advice as I believe I was a victim of Money Making Racket by the doctor and the hospital management 
Regards,
Ray

tags: None
review:
Administered only an injection which cost about 36k and wanted to administer it himself for another 4k.

When asked if any tablets could be given, he was truly against it. Said only injection can help. When he was forced to write tablets he simply wrote some medicines and also provided me the name and contact of the person who will be able to supply these medicines. Also asked me to but medicines only from the medical shops that is nearby. I believe that a wockhardt medicine could be found anywhere so I wonder why he insisted upon getting it only from the stores nearby or from his contact!

Constantly wanted us to visit the Fortis Hospital for other diseases. Told us he would recommend me to other Doctors.
reply_text: Dear Mrs Geetha Pandey, you consulted me in my clinic on 16-12-16.  I gone through your feed back and its unfortunate that you have turned all my advise and suggestion for your health related issues as complaint. As you aware that you suffer from multiple health problems and hence you are not advised long term pain medication & those group of medicines will have adverse impact on you.Instead you were offered local treatment for knee problem in terms of intra articular injection and supplements ( DUPACT) which are very safe in your case. Further for your other co morbid conditions viz Diabetes, HTN, swelling of both lower limbs ( ? CCF), I suggested you to consult the respective specialists. Regarding the medications, which are not been routinely prescribed ( like cough and cold or pain medication) and hence available in select outlets. I sincerely felt that its my duty to guide my patients. Finally I gave enough of my time to explain each and every aspect in detail to you and your attendants.

tags: None
review: It was a very bad experience over there.. I had visited the doctor for my shoulder pain  which he did not even bother to listen to me. I kept on explaining him but it went to his deaf ears. In five minutes he prescribed for a MRI.. Such a money minded greedy doctor that he was too busy asking as to what my son does rather than listening to my problem. I respect his knowledge that's why we went to him.  But to our utter disgust we found out that doctor was too busy to take care of his money than his patients. I solely feel that no one should visit him and get cheated.

tags: None
review:
The Doctor appeals as a friend and applies soothing words with trust . He goes deep into details and gives patient hearing. Though the process of meeting the doctor is lengthy in comparison to traditional institutions, it is worth waiting for . PowergesicMR is the real medicine I feel in the next morning . And Tendocare must take some time as it takes by default. I wish all the best so far the Doctor is concerned . I have many Doctors as my students , one is Dr.LKMeher at MKCG MedicalHospital,Brahmapur Odissa among them. Myself a retired Principal from Degree Colleges in Odisha with Zoology as subject of specialisation . Thanks to your institution . As I am to leave after two days I cherish to have contact for two minutes as reference . I wish to be allowed .
If the cure if felt before 14 days ( 2week course given) may I stop the PowergesicMR ?.
Thanking U.
Dr.JMMohanty,Ph.D.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Very good ...doctor explained the problem very well and he was very friendly.he was very positive in his attitude

tags: None
review: First it took two hours for consulting with veg few patients, one person only doing billing, xray and giving medicines. Then when we the doctor suggested for plaster, when asked for fees, he mentioned two strips of 1000 each. Later when you come to billing he charges a whooping 6300. **** *** ************* ** **** ** ** ************ ***** He could have mentioned at the start itself when enquires. Found it very unprofessional behaviour.
reply_text:
First of all appointment was at 11.30 am and entire treatment was completed before 12.30 pm. The first lie is exposed.
Later patient enquired only the cost of the plaster material, which was 1000 rupees each , 700 Rs discount given on plaster cast with out being asked by him. Second lie is exposed.Its fortunate on his part to get to see a senior Orthopaedic surgeon on Sunday.
 He thought professional fee comes free, that's the mentality of the patient. Rest of the cost included medicine, X Ray, cotton roll etc.
Further Cast shoe (Rs 350) was provided free to patient. 
He is utterly lost in appreciating the efforts & concern shown by the doctor & he is no  way qualified to speak about the Professionalism.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Highly recommended to this doctor.. treatment is very good, I was suffered knee lock from last 12 years and I took treatment here. doctor was very friendly nature.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Actually my ankle was fractured and i was so much worried, but he gave me so much of relaxation to me, and i was agreed for the operation, the way he did the operation and showed sympathy towards me i was so happy and now I can walk. Very competent and helpful Surgeon from first visit till all the follow up reviews. 


A REALLY BIG THANKS 🙏❤ TO DR. PRAKASH BL

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
We visited Dr Prakash BL for my mother’s  total knee replacement. 
The doctor’s  expertise in his area of work is commendable . What stood out for me is that he is very approachable, extremely patient and friendly , due to which we felt at ease and comfort throughout the process .
I definitely recommend Dr Prakash BL for any orthopaedic related issues.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Doctor listened the problem consciously and has written some blood test once you get this test done based on the result he told he will start the medication.iam suffering this problem from past 9months I have visited few doctors but no use .
I just positively hope he will resolve my problem.
But he did not explain why this problem will comes and what is technical name of this problem. Which I forgot to ask him as well.
reply_text: Please come back, will go through investigations report and will surely explain in detail about the condition and also treatment.

tags: None
review: I have visited Dr. Prakash for a couple of sports related injuries over last 1.5 years. ** *** * ***** ***** ** identify root cause of an injury and treat it. Results have been fantastic. Clinic also is very well maintained and in central Jayanagar. I recommend Dr.prakash.
reply_text: Thank  you very much, appreciate your feed back.

tags: Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We have consulted Dr. Prakash BL towards Both L/R Knee Joint Replacement Surgery. Surgery went well. Recovered soon. Doctor recommended us with **** medication and treatment through out. This was follow up consultation 4 months after surgery. Dr. Prakash is most experienced, successful and efficient personnel we came through in Bangalore.

tags: None
review: Superb satisfied with the explanation and medicines provided. Thanks a lot. I was worried if the signs are because of infection, I liked the way doctor explained. He not only answered my questions but also noticed few more issues by himself and suggested the process accordingly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: To start with, the clinic is very well maintained and hygiene. On top of it had a good experience consulting the dr. He examined and explained issues with my knee ver clearly and also he was very approachable and answered all my questions and confusions. Overall very happy with the service offered and I highly recommend others if they have any ortho issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The Doctor with his calm and cool attitude  makes the patient feel at ease and overcome the initial nervousness. His diagnostic approach  , explanation ,
and remedial corrective action suggested is to the point without any exaggeration.   I  will certainly  recommend to others. May his tribe increase. God bless.

When we consultant doctor clears explened what happened and further he started treatment. But never scared patient. We honorable

review: This was my first visit, Dr Prakash is Very friendly, listens very patiently, makes patient feel comfortable, explains health problems in detail without making patient panic.  Visited for low back and hip pain, started treatment from day 1 and awaiting for treatment response and hopefully recover fast. Thank You😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: I am really thankful for having a Dr like BL Prakash. He is so friendly, non judgemental and kind. He diagnosed me with Fibromyalgia, and i know its a difficult issue to diagnose. I know so many people who run from pillar to post and dont get diagnosed for years. Thank you Dr for being so awesome :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Ligament and Tendon Repair,De Quervain's Tenosynovitis Treatment,
review: A very senior and experienced doctor who can just look at the problem and give a reason for the pain. He was very careful while giving me any kind of treatment during pregnancy and also post delivery. He will give the best treatment for our problem in the most simple way without adding too many medications. He gave me the **** treatment during the most crucial phase of my life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Inam very happy with Dr Prakash and I am very statified with the way how he examined his patients. I have spine problem, ** * ***** **** ** ****** ********* **** * ** *** ********* **** ****** ******* So, I went to Fortis to Dr Prakash and everything was good and wonderful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I found  Dr Prakash is most competent  to understand the interdependency of multiple  complicated issues together and Quickly move towards treatment

His expertise is very much visible during the diagnosis Phase while being completely emphatic in the whole consulting process

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I went to show my concern about my lower back pain with back & side view of X-ray which was on march 2018.

No, suggestions  were provided for daily practices or exercise to follow or food diet.

Just a pain killer tablet & an pain relief ointment is suggested. Asked to do an MRI scanning. The consultation fee for this is Rs. 500/- which is not satisfying.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I was referred to Doctor PRAKASH B L by one of my colleague Shashikumar.  And I am very much satisfied  with consultation with him.  I had a problem with my Elbow (Tennis Elbow).  Wherein he has checked and prescribed the medicine and injection. Very friendly Doctor and I am very much satisfied with his Treatment.  
Will definitely reffer to my friends.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Very conservative doctor and highly experienced
We are consulting him for the past 9 years since he is very good

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: My wife met with accident 2 years ago and her hand was broken. In near by hospital, Plates were placed for both the bones in left hand. But for some reason, even after one year the bones were not united completely . Based on the reference from our friends , We visited Dr . Prakash BL in Fortis Hospital and he sugggested to go for one more surgery . Based on his recommendation, we went for that  and surgery process went well. six months after surgery, bones are almost united and my wife is able to do her routine work. Thanks to Dr. Prakash for his treatment.

tags: None
review:
He charged for second consultation just because I got the tests done from outside. I was told during first that I wouldn't be charged because I wasn't given any prescription and only a list of tests was to be done.
When I went for second consultation with test report,  was given various excuses that you got test done from outside so, we'll charge you or that you came after 4 days, had you come within 3 days we wouldn't have charged.
The test costs here were sky high. I was asked for 7000 ***** * *** *** **** ***** **** ** **** **** **** *********

tags: None
review:
I had to wait for more than 40 minutes past my appointment time. Staff was not responsive. 
Doctor himself did not try to understand all my problems ( I had multiple issues shoulder back knees). He hardly inspected me and asked for an xray. Upon telling that I got an xray done some time back, he asked to get an MRI without bothering to check the X-ray. ** ****** ** **** ****** ** ***** ** *** there was noone waiting after me in the clinic.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: It was fine moment to have friendly conversation in respect of treatment and   medical advice.  I shall definitely recommend Doctor to my relatives  and friends

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had my recurrent shoulder dislocation and visited doctor, i underwent arthroscopic surgery from him and till date I have no complications and post 3 days of surgery itself I could resume back to work .  I'm very much satisfied with the treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,

tags: None
review: Dr.Prakash identified the hair line fracture immediately he saw my leg which was missed by another doctor I had visited couple of days earlier. He put on a cast immediately with little pain. I visited him again yesterday and the cast was removed..iam getting back to walk slowly...simple talk,easy medication,no panic... Thanks Dr.

tags: None
review:
Dr spent 3 min for 600Rs, not worth of his time. he did not bothered to explain or give time to understand the issue and tell what is the problem
he did not show any interest in listening or understanding the concern from the patient, looked like wanted to run away from the seat

tags: None
review: He was welcoming. But he just saw the prob prescribed the medication! Told if pain doesn’t come down vl operate. He didn’t touch the affected area.. analyse suggest alternatives..instead insisted on Vit D tests in his clinic.. of which i had already given him my recent blood tests reports which he didn’t bother seeing. Just visit,take ur prescription and leave! Waste of time and money.
reply_text: Noted the comments. On controrary to what has been told by patient, she was examined clinically, since there was acute pain further examination was with held & diagnosis was made. Once came to know about recent investigations including Vit D, further tests aren't advised. Did spend more than required time to explain in detail to both patient & her mother.

tags: None
review: Very poor experience, didn't expect it from a reputed hospital. Doctor was not keen in listening to issue, instead he looked to be in too much hurry & appeared he wanted to target as many cases as possible. He didn't even look at previous prescription suggested by another doctor. Handed over his visiting card & asked me call his mobile recommending to visit his private clinic in future located at Jayanagar 9 block.

tags: None
review: my wife's palm is swollen with no specific reason. he just touched it.  he has not spent time in explaining the problem. he just suggested injection at swollen part of palm. since I requested alternative and forced, he guided us for physiotherapy.. we were not allowed to ask any more questions. I wasted 500 inr for 3 minutes of his unproductivity. I am highly disappointed and will not recommend any one for this doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor checked all the previous reports and prescribed medicine and injection for 1 month, but there was no relief from that, after 1 month visited he asked for one lab test, in reports everything was fine but he was not satisfied with the report. Again he gave medicine for 2 weeks and told will have to for surgery. after that I consulted another doctor ** ******* *** *** ******* *** ***** ** ** *** ***** ***** ** *** ***** ******So, for 1.5 months health and wealth were drained.
reply_text: It is simple, conservative treatment done for 6 weeks yeilded the results, patient found relief. However surgery recommended, if the symptoms persist & not on emergency basis.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: More than just being book-smart, patients want a doctor who is talented at what they do: A doctor who uses evidence, method, and intuition, as well as other subjective and objective items in their toolkit to provide the fastest, most effective treatment possible.

tags: Wait time,
review: ****** ** ****  he quickly identifies the problem, however doesn't elobrate the problem , i had wrist injury probably this might be the simplest injury and hence he might have spent less time consulting, but it would have been a good experience to let know if the pain is caused by muscle or tendon or bone injury etc..

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Excess bone in my elbow ***** ** ******* ** * ******* *** **** ********* *** doc told me to go for a elbow replacement 😳 he explained me the eblow replacement product and explained me the expenses.But I couldn't find it helpful, just wasted my consultation fee.
reply_text: The Gentleman visited me with sever arthritis of elbow joint with few degrees of movements left in the joint. This was due to previous fracture around elbow, was operated upon twice in last 7 years. Condition was explained in detail to him. However to my surprise, he is unable to understand his own situation, he is currently facing. How an Arthroscopic procedure or excision of few bony blocks would cure underlying arthritis or improve his elbow movements ?

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
